recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 450F. Add bread crumbs, eggs, water, cheese, garlic, parsley, seasoning, salt, and pepper to large bowl. Stir to combine. Add beef, mix by hand until just combined (overmixing will toughen meatballs).
Scoop about 3 Tbsp meat mixture to form balls. Roll in cupped hands until smooth. Arrange meatballs on baking sheet 1 1/2 inches apart.
Bake for 15 minutes or until internal temperature reaches 160F. Transfer to clean platter.
